Ugg boots are a type of fleece: lined sheepskin boot that originated in Australia and/or New Zealand.
Ugg boots are typically made from sheeps: derived from sheep that have been killed and skinned rather than simply sheared of their coats.
Various celebrities and animal rights gr: advocating for boots made from synthetic materials instead of animal products.
The Princeton Animal Welfare Society: PAWS) organized a protest against the fashion fur industry, specifically targeting ugg boots made from sheepskin.
